description: YouTube is a video-sharing platform with user-generated content, live streaming, and monetization opportunities, widely used for marketing, education, and entertainment

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_GET_CHANNEL_ACTIVITIES
capabilities.description: Gets recent activities from a YouTube channel including video uploads, playlist additions, likes, and other channel events.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_GET_CHANNEL_ID_BY_HANDLE
capabilities.description: Retrieves the YouTube Channel ID for a specific YouTube channel handle.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_GET_CHANNEL_STATISTICS
capabilities.description: Gets detailed statistics for YouTube channels including subscriber counts, view counts, and video counts.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_GET_VIDEO_DETAILS_BATCH
capabilities.description: Retrieves multiple YouTube video resource parts in a single batch call. Use when you need cohort-level metrics for many videos to reduce quota usage and latency.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_CAPTION_TRACK
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of caption tracks for a YouTube video, returning an empty list if no captions exist or failing if the video ID is invalid or not found.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_CHANNEL_VIDEOS
capabilities.description: Lists videos from a specified YouTube channel, ensuring results are of `type: 'video'`.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_PLAYLIST_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Tool to list videos in a playlist, with pagination support. Use when walking through a channel's uploads playlist to enumerate all videos.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_USER_PLAYLISTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves playlists owned by the authenticated user, implicitly using mine=True.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_USER_SUBSCRIPTIONS
capabilities.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's YouTube channel subscriptions, allowing specification of response parts and pagination.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_LOAD_CAPTIONS
capabilities.description: Downloads a specific YouTube caption track, which must be owned by the authenticated user, and returns its content as text. Note: This action requires you to own the video (YouTube Data API v3 restriction). Non-owned videos will return 403 Forbidden errors, including many auto-generated caption tracks.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_SEARCH_YOU_TUBE
capabilities.description: Searches YouTube for videos, channels, or playlists using a query term, returning the raw API response.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_SUBSCRIBE_CHANNEL
capabilities.description: Subscribes the authenticated user to a specified YouTube channel, identified by its unique `channelId` which must be valid and existing.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_UPDATE_THUMBNAIL
capabilities.description: Sets the custom thumbnail for a YouTube video using an image from thumbnailUrl; the authenticated user must have permission to edit the video.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_UPDATE_VIDEO
capabilities.description: Updates metadata for a YouTube video identified by videoId, which must exist; an empty list for tags removes all existing tags.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_UPLOAD_VIDEO
capabilities.description: Uploads a video from a local file path to a YouTube channel; the video file must be in a YouTube-supported format.

capabilities.name: YOUTUBE_VIDEO_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Retrieves specified information parts (e.g., snippet, contentDetails, statistics) for a YouTube video, identified by its ID.
